snippet: Michigan’s Caro High School canceled the final three games of its football season this week, and the schools superintendent says the reaction to the decision has been mixed.
abstract: Michigan’s Caro High School football team, decimated by injuries, decides to focus on safety of players on its outmanned varsity team by canceling final three games of its football season; schools superintendent Mike Joslyn says reaction to the decision has been mixed.
lead_paragraph: Michigan’s Caro High School canceled the final three games of its football season this week, and the schools superintendent says the reaction to the decision has been mixed.

headline.seo: High School Football Team in Caro, Mich., Cancels Games, Citing Player Safety
headline.main: Varsity Football Team Ends Season Because of Injuries
headline.print_headline: Varsity Football Team Ends Season Because of Injuries
